name: .AXX File Extension
summary: Learn about .AXX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An AXX file is a file that has been encrypted by AxCrypt, a file encryption tool for Windows. It stores the contents of a file, such as an .XLSX spreadsheet or a .JPG image, in a protected format that users can only open with the correct password. In some cases, a key file may also be required for access (e.g., a .TXT, .KEY, or .DAT file).

content: AxCrypt is a file encryption software designed for Windows (and later macOS, Android, and iOS) that enables users to securely encrypt individual files using strong encryption standards, such as AES-128 and AES-256 (it also provides built-in file compression to reduce file sizes). Individuals, small businesses, and privacy-conscious users who want a simple way to encrypt files for storage or transmission primarily use AxCrypt and AXX files to protect sensitive documents such as financial records, personal files, or work-related data.
NOTE: Axantum Software AB, a Swedish company, initially developed AxCrypt. The tool gained popularity in the 2000s and eventually transitioned to a more structured organization named AxCrypt AB.

instructions: You can open an AXX file with AxCrypt. To open an AXX file, you must enter the correct password (and key file, if used during encryption) in AxCrypt.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
